contents:
短网址在其about页面的功能描述：这位网友发布的短链接在virus total检测出三个...


剛剛試著將 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1989_Tiananmen_Square_protests 頁面加入 短网址

再將產生的連結丟進 VirusTotal

https://www.virustotal.com/gui/url/7177725bb775425db323fd9f8a2c813730da93429c590b4c3b29d0ceaf324b16/details

同樣會產生三個 Tracker

Facebook Connect
1675200226052423 (https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js)

Facebook Custom Audience
1675200226052423 (https://www.facebook.com/tr?id=1675200226052423&ev=PageView&noscript=1)

Google Analytics
UA-102456694-1 (https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js)

詳細可見 Source code
